00011 // for the calibrated energy deposited in the Module. However, no such calibration

00013 // file, no doubt.

00060 void KHLAMuonModuleRecord::Clear(Option_t *opt)

00063   //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist

00087 Bool_t KHLAMuonModuleRecord::IsSame(const KHLAMuonModuleRecord &aRec, Bool_t bPrint) const
00088 {
00089         //Compares two objects and their member variables to test for equality.
00090         //If bPrint is set to true, then a message for each member variable that is different
00091         //will print to standard out. Otherwise, this method will return false and quit
00092         //checking member variables as soon as it finds a unequal data member.
00093         
00094         Bool_t bIsEqual = true; //assume its true, then test for differences
00095         
00096         //call the base class's IsSame methods
00097         if(!this->KMuonModuleRecord::IsSame(aRec,bPrint)){
00098                 bIsEqual = false;
00099                 if(!bPrint)
00100                         return false;  //if we're not printing out, just return false at first failure
00101                 //the operator== method uses this functionality.
00102         }
00103         
00104         
00105         
00106         /*for(Int_t i = 0; i < kNumPmtsPerMuonModule; i++){
00107                 if(fEnergy[i] != aRec.fEnergy[i]){
00108                         bIsEqual = false;
00109                         if (bPrint) 
00110                                 cout << "KHLAMuonModuleRecord fEnergy["<<i<<"] Not Equal. lhs: " 
00111                                 << fEnergy[i] << " != rhs " << aRec.fEnergy[i] << endl;         
00112                         else
00113                                 return false;  
00114                 }
00115         }*/
00116         
00117         return bIsEqual;
00118 }
